summary: Senior Frontend-Focused Engineer with a strong command of Next.js and React, bringing over 4 years of professional experience in remote-friendly settings. Adept at building performant, scalable, and SEO-friendly applications through server-side rendering, static site generation, and state management libraries. Recognized for delivering reliable, maintainable code while leading cross-functional teams, championing best practices, and enhancing user experience. Passionate about designing software solutions that balance speed, quality, and collaborative innovation.

details: üèÖ GPA: 3.79, Top 4% of class.
Combined deep understanding of data structures and algorithms (trees, graphs, Dijkstra‚Äôs) with Python, Go, and C++ to build efficient software solutions.
Solved 1,000+ algorithmic challenges and achieved a Top 2.5% LeetCode ranking, demonstrating a high-level problem-solving approach and strong collaborative mindset.
Steered frontend development for an AI-powered video annotation platform, leveraging Next.js features like server-side rendering and dynamic routing to enhance load performance and SEO by 25%.
Developed reusable components with TypeScript and Redux, ensuring consistent design across web interfaces and improving overall maintainability.
Collaborated with backend teams using Flask and Node.js, integrating RESTful APIs and asynchronous task management with Celery, ensuring a reliable multi-service architecture deployed via AWS.

items.role: Africa to Silicon Valley | Head of Education & Lead Frontend Developer
details: Led the development of an interactive platform (HakimHub) using Next.js, React, and Redux, introducing user authentication flows and real-time functionalities that enhanced engagement by 30%.
Architected and scaled microservices for a food delivery system (RateEat) using Node.js and Nest.js on GCP, seamlessly integrating Next.js and Redux for consistent, performant UIs.

Coordinated a distributed team across different time zones, fostering an inclusive culture of collaboration and continuous improvement, contributing to stable feature rollouts and high user satisfaction rates.
Designed modular RESTful APIs with Flask, SQLAlchemy, and JWT for secure session handling, focusing on robust authentication and fault tolerance.
Applied comprehensive QA practices (Selenium, Jest, Cypress, Postman) and implemented GitHub Actions for automated CI/CD, reducing production bugs by approximately 40%.
Collaborated closely with UI/UX designers to ensure technical feasibility of core features, leading to a more intuitive user experience and streamlined development cycles.
Elevated digital payment experiences by integrating a Go-based backend for low-latency transactions and improved reliability under high traffic.
Implemented client-facing components in Next.js, ensuring fast load times and dynamic content updates for a seamless user experience.
Developed a high-performance UI with React and Next.js for real-time restaurant reviews, boosting user engagement through instant feedback loops.
Introduced Redux-based state management to maintain consistent data flow, delivering smooth performance and maintainable application structure.
Core Frontend & Frameworks: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js (SSR/SSG), Redux, Vue.js, Vuex
Web & UI: HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, Styled Components, Responsive Design
Backend & APIs: Node.js, Express.js, Flask, RESTful APIs, GraphQL, WebSockets
DevOps & Cloud: AWS (Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS, API Gateway), Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Jenkins
Additional Languages: Python, Go, C/C++, Shell scripting
Recognized among the Top 2.5% on LeetCode, showcasing advanced algorithmic and data structure expertise.
Won $1000 in a month-long coding competition, underscoring consistency in problem-solving and adaptability in high-pressure environments.
